Class ActionButton

A button representing the main actions during battle. This includes battle actions like Jump, Hammer, etc. This is only used by the player

OnSelected()

What occurs when this ActionButton is selected. In most cases, this would bring up a SubMenu, but in other instances (Ex. having no additional Jump badges equipped) This can lead directly to an action
